file_content.text: That's the last scrambler. Now to get a fix on that signal....
The signal's originating from a nearby cave. Fulminiss must be inside!
So far this mission is a breeze. Want to bet it gets harder in a hurry?
I get the feeling this mission's about to get a whole lot harder.
Lord Fulminiss is dangerous. As are his apprentices. This won't be easy.
I recommend an immediate frontal assault. Catch the enemy unprepared!
Jedi + T7 = stop Fulminiss // Save Voss = Jedi + T7 heroes!
